gen:link.msg:message: `InvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfParticipants` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_InvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfParticipants')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_InvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfParticipants return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfParticipantsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfParticipantsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfParticipantsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfParticipantsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
